title: Sickening moment a man is punched and kicked in the head outside a McDonald's in Perth
text:
A man has been punched and kicked in the head during a sickening brawl at a McDonald's car park in Perth.

The horrific footage shows the alleged attacker lunge at a man dressed in jeans at the fast food car park off Beeliar Drive in Success on Saturday night.

The man is forced to the concrete where he cops continual blows to the head from his attacker, before a third man attempts to intervene, 7News reported.

During the altercation one of the men is heard saying 'you want to get knocked out?' to which another replies 'yeah knock him out'.

Dressed in shorts and a t-shirt, the young attacker only appears to back-off from the fight when an onlooker says police have been called to the scene.

'The cops are coming,' a witness says.

'No they're not,' he responds.

One witness said the scene was 'chaos'.

The man is forced to the concrete where he cops continual blows to the head from his attacker , before a third man attempts to intervene

'I was just walking to my car like parked in front of where it happened and then there was like three guys that were like just there and there was just chaos and everything,' she told 7News.

A WA Police spokesman told Daily Mail Australia they received reports of fighting but when crews arrived at the scene there was 'no disturbance occurring'.

'Police spoke to people inside the store and conducted patrols of the area but were unable to locate any suspicious person/s,' the spokesman said.

It's understood no official complaint has been made.
description: The horrific footage shows the alleged attacker lunge at a man dressed in jeans at the fast food car park off Beeliar Drive in Success on Saturday night.
authors: Zoe Zaczek For Daily Mail Australia
